amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE VI--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISION SEC. 601. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to purchase light bulbs unless the light bulbs have the "ENERGY STAR" or "Federal Energy Management Program" designation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds to be used to purchase light bulbs unless the light bulbs have the "ENERGY STAR" or "Federal Energy Management Program" designation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harman amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Ms. Harman.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harman amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
